message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe has significant potential for your business. I'm not going to disclose the specifics of the product just yet, but I can assure you it's worth a minimum of $1200000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
